channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1458269108365971464
item.description:
Here are some examples of what I am seeing daily now for the last week or so. These discrepancies never existed in the past. Today Hinshaw stated: 422 New cases 8 New deaths
AHS open data shows: 433 new cases 4 new deaths
I've been noticing errors in all data points. https://t.co/sngQur7AUY

item.title: #es @ 1458188026597806084
item.description: Me parece increíble que en 2021 una institución pública suba tablas en su sitio web en Word o PDFs de cientos o miles de hojas. ¿Qué clase de "open data" es esa? ¿Es intencional para hacer el trabajo más difícil a quienes utilizan datos públicos?

item.description:
I believe all (empirical) (coauthored) research should be done over @github, and let me tell you why.

#EconTwitter #research #OpenData

item.title: #en @ 1458013857763532801
item.description: New on #MENAdoc: Hidāya-i fārsī (4 volumes, Kolkata 1807-1808) https://t.co/c8lKTZi46n This legal Hanafi manual was printed in its Persian translation by British colonial authorities and played a key role in the standardisation in what came to be known as "Anglo-Muhammadan law". https://t.co/aucFLj7ofR

item.description: I work with some vigilantes who find trash in the river with an address on some of it. They visit the person who lives at the address to ask why their trash is in the river. item.description: Ejam tālāk ar pilsētas datu atvēršanu - ģeotelpiskie, kadastra, ortofoto, RTP, investīciju, pilsētvides u.c. datu slāņi #georīga Paredzams, ka jau nāk.gada vasarā būs palaista 1.versija, lai testētu vienkāršo lietotāju pieredzi un to pēc tam uzlabotu #ux #opendata #citydata

item.title: #en @ 1457625825092718598
item.description: How can #sensor #data be described, analysed, visualised, or made sense of?
